package.name: HTML_QuickForm_DHTMLRulesTableless
package.summary: DHTML replacement for the standard JavaScript alert window for client-side validation using the tableless renderer
package.description: This is a DHTML replacement for the standard JavaScript alert window for client-side validation of forms built with HTML_QuickForm when using the HTML_QuickForm_Renderer_Tableless renderer.
package.notes: - improved and fixed error style assignment and error message displaying: * in some cases the error style (i.e. the red border in the default stylesheet) and the error message were still shown even if the element was made valid * if there are multiple error messages for an element, now all of these messages will be shown (and not only the last message) - Request #9497: changed escaping of <script> tag for better compatibility with older browsers (thanks to Will Fris, pear_dev at willfris dot nl) - adopted stylesheet changes form tableless renderer to the example file
